title: Go U.S. Military!!!
content:
Guess what, me and my cousin have created a forum dedicated to the U.S. Military called Go U.S. Military, or GoMi for short.

www.gomi.greatboard.com

Please, if you hate the U.S. Military, do not join. It will result in an IP BAN.

People from other countries can join, but only join if you really, really like the U.S. Military.

There are forums about the 5 branches of the Military, and our country's wars.

Enjoy!!!

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

(Darn, I want a U.S. Emotiakeen, not this dang [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-british.gif[/img] )Proud Leader of the "Tough Guys Wear Pink" Society
[img]http://www.najawa.com/LLMod.jpeg[/img]
"Tough Guys Wear Pink!!!"
Visit My site at [url=http://www.najawa.com]www.najawa.com[/url]
[url=http://kevan.org/brain.cgi?Najawa]Click Here!!! Please!!![/url]
-- NAJAWA --

title: Re: Go U.S. Military!!!
content:

title: Re: Go U.S. Military!!!
content:
what will go on in this forum???

-What are the troops doing right now?
-Sorry, I'm a GoMi noob, how can I support teh troops?
-Why U.S military haters should be burned at the stake, right after they are shot with the next generation of U.S. artillery.
-Hey I hate the U.S. (Locked Topic)

How much of this can one stand?
Why don't you watch the Pentagon channel or something???

title: Re: Go U.S. Military!!!
content:
KR; you would not fall in the catigory of the 'Avarage American Guy'.

The forums are dedicated to discussing the wars (e.g. American Revolution), and asking questions like, "Why the heck did G. Washington camp in Valley Forge, when he could have kept warm that winter by keeping active, and blowing the **** out of the british" and we answer, "Well, you see the British had encamped their troops in a way..."

And that is where a more intelligent poster chimes in.

My cousin know a lot about the military.

No profanity
[quote]Quote:[hr]2) No Suggesting of nudity[hr][/quote]

Well... is this to hard?

[quote]Quote:[hr]no profanity[hr][/quote]

Well, I would really be telling my friends about a site chalked full of language.

It is a military fan-site, not for the military itself. They can post if they want, but they follow my rules.Proud Leader of the "Tough Guys Wear Pink" Society

title: Re: Go U.S. Military!!!
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]I would say the same. Believe that an army can bring peace is pure lunacy, in my opinion.[hr][/quote]

1.) It is possible to like something even if it does have negative consequences. Smoking for example, or fans of Hitler.

2.) An arm can bring peace, by several routes despite being primarily defined as a war causing force.

Firstly the threat of military retaliation may force either another army or insurgents in an area to refrain from aggresive activities; this stopped a lot of wars from both Americia and Russia [but plenty happened anyways]

Secondly an army may be used to enforce civil obediance in a politically volitile or emergency situation. The army was expected to have a prescence in New Orleans for example.

Thirdly an army may oppose another army and thus halt their aggressive activities. Thus peace is brought by war on another. Sometimes war is necessary; the allies attempted to avoid it at all costs before being forced to oppose the axis powers.

A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.png[/img]

-Levellord
